ModMetaData.name: 安静的死亡迷雾 Silent DeathPall
ModMetaData.author: RunningBugs
ModMetaData.description:
安静的死亡迷雾
死亡迷雾复活蹒跚怪是左上角的消息会发出声音，如果短期内有很多尸体复活，会有点吵，本模组解决了这个问题
Silent DeathPall
DeathPall resurrected Shamblers will make a sound in the upper left message, if there are many corpses resurrected in a short period of time, it will be a bit noisy, this mod solves this problem
